name: Rollin' (itch) (Error Code 864G)
description:
I joined a game jam late and made a game for it. Not much to say.
~864G

W/Space/Up to jump

Jump while in air to go downwards

You get points passively, but slowly.

You get more when on a block.

You get even more when off the screen.

The current high score is: 45

Comment if you get a higher score than that. (you might need to attach an image for me to believe you because it took me a while to get 45)


Thanks to https://projectmizuki.itch.io/, she did the background and the logo.
